SELECT comment.id,comment.bid,comment.content,comment.gmt_create,comment.good,!isnull(cgood.id) as goodreply, ruser.id as uid,ruser.nickname as username,ruser.avatar, rcomment.id as replyId,rcomment.content as rcontent, rcomment.rid, rcomment.good as cgood,rcomment.gmt_create as cgmt_create,rcomment.goodr, rcomment.uid as cuid,cuser.nickname as cname,cuser.avatar as cavatar, rcomment.touid as touid,tuser.nickname as tname
FROM red_message_comment comment LEFT JOIN edu_user ruser on comment.uid = ruser.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT myc.id,myc.content,myc.good,myc.rid,myc.uid,myc.touid,myc.gmt_create,!isnull(rgood.id) as goodr FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rid ORDER BY gmt_create DESC) rn ,red_blog_comment_reply.* FROM red_message_comment_reply) t2 WHERE t2.rn < #{rsize} ) myc LEFT JOIN red_message_comment_good rgood on myc.uid = rgood.uid and myc.id = rgood.cid and rgood.gtype = 2 and rgood.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY gmt_create,goodr DESC ) as rcomment on rcomment.rid =comment.id
LEFT JOIN red_message_comment_good cgood on comment.uid = cgood.uid and comment.id = cgood.cid and cgood.gtype = 1 and cgood.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN edu_user cuser on rcomment.uid = cuser.id LEFT JOIN edu_user tuser on rcomment.touid = tuser.id
WHERE comment.id in ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM red_message_comment WHERE mid = #{mid}
ORDER BY good DESC
ORDER BY red_message_comment.gmt_create DESC
LIMIT #{size} ) as subreply )
ORDER BY good DESC
ORDER BY gmt_create DESC

SELECT comment.id,comment.bid,comment.content,comment.gmt_create, ruser.id as uid,ruser.nickname as username,ruser.avatar FROM red_message_comment comment LEFT JOIN edu_user ruser on comment.uid = ruser.id WHERE comment.id = #{cid}
